body.note: In most cases, you don't need use TAGS, so leave empty in configuration.
body.p: In some cases, you want to have a Shinken server related to a GLPI entity (so have 2 Shinken servers related to 2 differents entities). This configuration is used when each entity is a different and distant site and not have link between these sites, but they have link to the GLPI (hosted on a web server for example). So in this case, we must tag the GLPI entities and each Shinken server.

ul.li: In Shinken, it's in configuration of Arbiter module named GLPI.
In GLPI, it's on tab Monitoring in entities forms.
